name: ritual shopping
description:
You are a witch planning to make a ritual, but you need some things to make it work.

Gather some magical stuff!

Do rituals and spells! (Disclaimer: not really rituals, more like... one ritual. It's a small game.)

Explore the town! (But not too much. It's SMALL.)

Talk to weird people! (Not SUPER weird. More like... normal people kind of weird.)

Created for the 19th monthly #bitsyjam!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, run into things to interact with them.

CREDITS:
  • Idea/Art/Basically everything: yours truly.
  • Music (in the future)/Watching me draw weird stuff via Skype: Fran (Twitter). You're the best.
  • Supporting me through my MANY tries at game jams: my gorgeous friends. I would punch anyone if you asked me to.
